sentences.sContent: The movie will have to be a huge hit to recoup its cost.
sentences.sCn: 这部电影必须大获成功才能收回成本。

sentences.sContent: He was desperate to try and recoup his losses.
sentences.sCn: 他不顾一切地试图挽回损失。

remMethod.val: re(反) + coup(意外的行动) → 对意外行为的反馈 → 补偿

trans.tranOther: to get back an amount of money you have lost or spent

trans.tranCn: 补偿； 恢复， 重获； 偿还
